original_text: Foreign people will take your children away to be their slaves. Every day, you will look for them to come back to you. But you will have no power to do anything.
korean_text: 네 자녀를 다른 민족에게 빼앗기고 종일 생각하고 찾음으로 눈이 피곤하여지나 네 손에 힘이 없을 것이며

sentences.original_text: Foreign people will take your children away
sentences.korean_translation: 이방 사람들이 당신의 자녀들을 데려갈 것입니다

sentences.original_text: you will look for them to come back to you
But you will have no power
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 당신은 어떤 힘도 갖지 못할 것입니다
